Name: 307 Racing
About the game: Circuit racing is the common name for several types of car races, held on special tracks with hard surfaces. The main feature of such competitions is that the track has a closed form (ring). The goal of the competitor is simple - to arrive first. The essence of the game , to overtake all competitors in a ring race. The game has several looped tracks, you need to compete with other cars. C - camera change Game features: - good graphics; - easy control; - interesting gameplay; - unforgettable adventure;
